document_data.caption: Silverleaf Halfmoon, helping [[Lordan]] heal [[Delvar Ironfist]]The art used to represent [[Taran Goldenstar]] is very similar to the art of Silverleaf Halfmoon; it is assumed that Taran is the one that's been bared, tied up, and whipped by a bugbear.
document_data.name: Silverleaf Halfmoon
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverleaf Halfmoon''' was an [[adventuring]] [[elf]] in the [[Dalelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Silverleaf was a competent warrior, and wielded wizardly abilities as well.
document_data.Possessions: Of note, he carried a [[bow]] and a [[quarterstaff]].
document_data.Relationships:
Silverleaf was from the same tribe as [[Taran Goldenstar]].

In Freedale, he was part of an adventuring party with [[Beldar]], [[Delvar Ironfist]], [[Morganth]], [[Slinker]], and [[Lordan]].
document_data.History: Silverleaf Halfmoon was part of an adventuring group in [[Freedale]] that may have rescued Taran Goldenstar, recovered the ''[[orb of dragonkind]]'', faced [[Gunter Weiss]] in [[Harrow Hill]], and perhaps explored [[Azazabus]]' dungeon under [[Mount Dread]].
